articles.title: Daniel's Donuts and Sooshi Mango launch limited-edition range as brand expands nationally
articles.author: Tom Gosby
articles.summary: Daniel's Donuts has launched two limited-edition, Italian-inspired donut varieties, the Sooshi Mango Double Hazelnut Tiramisu Donut and Choc & Vanilla Cannoli Donut, in collaboration with comedy trio Sooshi Mango. These new donuts are available at all Daniel's Donuts locations across Victoria and New South Wales starting June 3, coinciding with International Donut Day.

articles.title: Do The Lamelo Ball Clippers Rumors Have Any Legitimacy?
articles.summary: The WeAreIowa app allows users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones. This new app provides a mobile platform for accessing WeAreIowa's streaming service.

articles.title: My Honest Review of the DreamCloud Hybrid Mattress
articles.author: Christine Flammia
articles.summary: DreamCloud introduced the Premier Rest Hybrid mattress. It features a hybrid design with memory foam and wrapped coils, aiming to provide support without lumps and softness without heat trapping. The mattress has a soft quilted top and offers a 365-day trial period.

articles.title: 54 Best Father's Day Gifts He Actually Deserves
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article features many gift ideas for father's day, containing introductions to many new products or services. These include the Away carry-on, Belkin 3-in-1 Apple MagSafe travel charger, Churchill Steakhouse Ribeye and Filet Mignon Prime Steak box, Valor Provisions lifetime membership, TheraGun, Last Crumb cookie box, Courant standing charger, Bartesian cocktail machine, Hamilton Beach DrinkMaster, Eufy robot mop and vacuum, Ember temperature control ceramic mug, AirPods Pro 2, Cuisinart knife set, magnetic rotating UFO-shaped Bluetooth speaker, Hexclad nonstick pan, and Mercach exercise bike.

articles.title: Jennifer Kraft Secures U.S. Patent for Ezzy Access Pants – Empowering People with Disabilities One ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Jennifer Kraft has received a U.S. design patent for Ezzy Access Pants. These pants are designed as a stylish, functional, and adaptive solution to improve accessibility.

articles.title: Talenti Gelato Jars Are Notoriously Hard to Open, so the Brand Is Working on a Fix
articles.author: Joseph Lamour
articles.summary: Talenti is rolling out a new lid for its ice cream jars as a short-term fix to address customer complaints about the difficulty of opening them. The company also has a team working on a long-term packaging solution to improve ease of use while maintaining the signature look of the jars. This new lid can alleviate the problem of opening the ice cream jars.

articles.title: How to watch Bravo's ‘Next Gen NYC' premiere for free without cable
articles.author: Madison Kemeny
articles.summary: Bravo is launching a new reality series called 'Next Gen NYC' premiering on June 3, 2025, at 9 p.m. ET. The series will be available on streaming platforms like Fubo, DirecTV (offering a free WNBA opening weekend trial), and Sling (providing half off the first month and a free month of AMC+).

articles.title: Corrao Group Launches MyFirst TPM™
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Corrao Group launched MyFirst TPM™, a trade promotion management (TPM) solution, leveraging Salesforce TPM. This solution aims to provide fast-growing consumer packaged goods (CPG) brands with a streamlined, scalable, and affordable path to TPM success on Salesforce. The deployment timeline is stated to be five months.

articles.title: From the wardrobe to the bathroom shelf: Men, here's how to survive the summer
articles.author: OSHER LENNY HAIM
articles.summary: Jo Malone London introduced Wood Sage & Sea Salt fragrance. MAC launched Hyper Real Serumizer Eye serum. Estée Lauder expanded its skincare line with Overnight Treatment night cream. L'Oréal's men's line launched a skincare routine for acne treatment.

articles.title: The Hybrid Mattress We Love Right Now
articles.author: Christine Flammia
articles.summary: DreamCloud's Premier Rest Hybrid mattress offers coil support and memory foam softness. The mattress features a soft quilted top and aims to provide a comfortable and supportive sleep experience, particularly for sleepers who stay in the middle of the bed. It is positioned as a mid-range priced option offering a balance of comfort and support.

articles.title: UGG's new platform sneaker will replace your Sambas this summer
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: UGG has launched a new product: the EZ-Duzzit T-Strap Platform Sneaker, designed as a summer footwear option.

articles.title: Homeowners Spent Hundreds Of Dollars On An Ice Making Machine, But What They Found Inside Was Disgusting
articles.author: Ben Auxier
articles.summary: A TikTok user reported that GE's Ice Nugget machine, despite regular cleaning, accumulated significant mold and grime inside, which was difficult to access and clean without disassembling the entire unit. The user criticizes GE for the product's poor design and the health risks it poses, especially considering its high price point.

articles.title: Bluehost WonderSuite Website Builder
articles.summary: Bluehost has integrated its WonderSuite website builder with WordPress, providing users with an accessible alternative for creating websites with e-commerce options. The Bluehost WonderSuite is a website builder powered by AI and it has several tiers including Basic, Choice Plus, or eCommerce Essentials.  It allows users to easily build dependable, attractive pages with e-commerce options.

articles.title: A new Lululemon dress is stirring up the internet. Here's why
articles.author: Greta Cross
articles.summary: Lululemon launched a new 2-in-1 Maxi Dress, priced at $148, which functions as both an ankle-length maxi skirt and a strapless dress. The dress has garnered mixed reactions on social media, with some praising its versatility and others questioning its value, leading to the dress being sold out in most sizes except extra large.

articles.title: Sagtec Unveils AI-Powered Robotics Platform to Redefine Front-of-House Dining Operations  Jun. 3, 2025 20:18
articles.summary: Sagtec Global Limited has commercially launched its AI-powered robotics platform designed for front-of-house operations in the global hospitality sector. The platform combines autonomous robotics, AI algorithms, and real-time software orchestration, featuring capabilities like natural language ordering, precision robotic arm integration, and customizable UI/UX. This launch targets a scalable recurring revenue model within the service robotics market.

articles.title: Microsoft's New Xbox Milk Pitcher Joins a Long Line of Bizarre Creations: Here Are 5 of the Weirdest
articles.author: Vinay Patel
articles.summary: Microsoft, under its Xbox Canada brand, has introduced an Xbox-branded milk pitcher inspired by the Xbox Series X. This follows other unconventional merchandise releases such as the Xbox Mini Fridge and the Xbox Series S Toaster. Also Microsoft introduced Microsoft Bob, Microsoft EasyBall, Microsoft ActiMates, Microsoft Comic Chat and Microsoft Kin.

articles.title: 11 Best Fanny Packs of 2025 Give Your Pockets a Break
articles.author: Tyler Chin
articles.summary: Dagne Dover introduced the Ace Belt Bag, known for its neoprene material and functional design, featuring multiple pockets and a key holder. Loewe's Puzzle Edge Small Leather Belt Bag stands out with its jigsaw-like paneling and high-quality calf leather. Lululemon offers the Everywhere Belt Bag 1L, a streamlined and water-repellent option focusing on practicality and affordability.

articles.title: Polyvance Launches New Website and Online Store to Enhance Customer Experience
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Polyvance is launching its redesigned website and online store (www.polyvance.com) on June 5, 2025. The updated platform offers faster navigation, a modern design, new e-commerce capabilities including free shipping and improved product imagery.

articles.title: New sub-$30k car confirmed for New Zealand
articles.author: Stuff
articles.summary: Plucky is launching a new crossover, attempting to differentiate itself in the small, affordable car market.

articles.title: Elon Musk launches XChat to challenge WhatsApp, Telegram globally
articles.author: MOTOLANI OSENI
articles.summary: Elon Musk launched XChat, a new encrypted messaging feature, on the X platform (formerly Twitter). XChat aims to compete with platforms like WhatsApp and Telegram and includes features like end-to-end encryption, vanishing messages, and file sharing. This launch is part of Musk's plan to develop X into a comprehensive digital ecosystem.

articles.title: New laundromat fills vacant gas station site in Faribault
articles.summary: The Laundry Shute, a new laundromat, opened on May 24 in Faribault. It offers laundry services with coin and card payment options.

articles.title: 10th Sheetz location in Dayton area now open
articles.author: WHIO Staff
articles.summary: Sheetz opened its 10th gas station in the Dayton area, located on Alex Road in West Carrollton. The new gas station began serving customers at 9 a.m. on Tuesday.

articles.title: Doherty's Irish Pub at 2025 Farm to Fork Picnic in the Triangle
articles.author: Amber Freeman
articles.summary: Nugget ice makers are available for home use, offering Sonic-quality ice.

articles.title: Jiffy Junk to Launch National After-Hours Emergency Cleanup Service for Businesses, Powered by Smart AI
articles.author: Jiffy Junk
articles.summary: Jiffy Junk is launching a new after-hours emergency cleanup service for commercial clients, utilizing advanced AI-powered systems for fast dispatch, real-time updates, and effortless wrap-ups. The service aims to provide businesses with swift and reliable support for urgent cleanups, even late at night.

articles.title: Need a Father's Day gift idea? Check out these popular tech gadgets
articles.author: WNDU.com
articles.summary: Verizon is highlighting several Samsung products for Father's Day, including the new Galaxy Z Fold 6 foldable phone, Galaxy Buds3 Pro with AI noise cancellation, and Galaxy Watch Ultra with motion technology. They are also featuring deals on the Samsung Galaxy S25 phone and Galaxy S10 Tablet.

articles.title: FastBots Launches Groundbreaking Hybrid AI and Live Chat Feature to Transform Customer Support Operations
articles.summary: FastBots.ai has launched a new Hybrid AI and Live Chat feature designed for customer support teams. The feature utilizes AI to manage routine inquiries and allows support agents to handle complex interactions, enhancing operational efficiency and customer experiences. Businesses can integrate this feature to decrease response times and improve customer satisfaction.

articles.title: 5 gadgets to make your home smart without the hassle of complex setups or expensive systems
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: The article presents smart plugs that allow controlling devices via phone or voice, smart bulbs with dimming and color temperature control, Amazon Echo and Google Nest smart speakers for voice commands, video doorbells with remote viewing and communication, and smart thermostats for automated heating and cooling adjustments. These devices aim to simplify home automation and improve comfort and efficiency.

articles.title: Your Android Phone Can Now Run Photoshop and It's Totally Free (for Now)
articles.author: Yoona Wagener
articles.summary: Adobe launched the Photoshop Beta app on the Google Play Store, providing Android users with free access to all features, including AI-powered tools, during the beta period. This release follows the earlier launch of the Photoshop app for iPhones, expanding mobile editing capabilities to Android creators. More features are planned for future updates.

articles.title: FastBots Launches Groundbreaking Hybrid AI and Live Chat Feature to Transform Customer Support Operations
articles.author: Fast Bots
articles.summary: FastBots.ai launched its Hybrid AI and Live Chat feature, designed for customer support teams. The feature combines automated AI chat with personalized human agent support to manage customer interactions, reduce response times, and improve customer satisfaction.

articles.title: artificial Archives
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: A company is launching 'daylist', a new feature available for both free ad-supported and paid users. This AI-powered feature learns from user tastes and changes throughout the day depending on their mood.

articles.title: 27 Sephora Products With A Ton Of 5-Star Reviews
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: Several new beauty products and updates are highlighted, including Kora Organics Turmeric Glow Foaming Cleanser, Haus Labs Foundation by Lady Gaga, Hourglass Skin Tint, Ilia The Base Face Milk , Dieux Instant Angel moisturizer, and K18 Leave-In Repair Hair Mask. These products range from cleansers and foundations to hair masks and moisturizers, each designed to provide specific benefits like improved skin texture, coverage, or hair repair and are being newly introduced or gaining popularity in the market.

articles.title: Spot the difference: Why is this £450 whisky only £63 on Amazon?
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Sky Mobile is offering a free Samsung Galaxy Tab A9+ (worth £259) with the purchase of the new Samsung Galaxy S25 5G phone. The offer is valid until June 26, 2025, and provides Samsung's latest phone with a low monthly cost.

articles.title: This car wash company gives back to Birmingham—see how you can get a free wash
articles.author: Grace Garrison
articles.summary: New Day Car Wash is launching two new locations in Fultondale and along Highway 280, with grand opening events featuring their philanthropic initiative "Wash for a Cause." The grand openings include free Signature Car Washes, discounted memberships, local food vendors, and swag giveaways. The company also offers fundraising programs for local organizations.

articles.title: Freshii Launches Its First Lineup of Premium, Top-Quality Poke Bowls, Now Available Across Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Freshii has launched a new line of premium poke bowls across Canada, featuring sushi-grade salmon, prawns, ahi tuna, or tofu, along with sliced avocados and other fresh ingredients. The poke bowls, priced at $16.99, are available in teriyaki and ponzu flavors and include fresh ingredients prepared daily in-store.

articles.title: Freshii Launches Its First Lineup of Premium, Top-Quality Poke Bowls, Now Available Across Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Freshii has launched a new lineup of premium poke bowls across Canada, featuring sushi-grade salmon, prawns, ahi tuna, or tofu, and sliced avocados. The company spent over a year developing the product line, aiming to deliver quality meals with unique flavors that satisfy consumer needs for convenience and value.

articles.title: Freshii Launches Its First Lineup of Premium, Top-Quality Poke Bowls, Now Available Across Canada
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Freshii has launched its first-ever lineup of premium poke bowls across Canada, featuring sushi-grade salmon, prawns, ahi tuna, or tofu, along with sliced avocados and other fresh ingredients. The new poke bowls are available in two flavour styles, teriyaki and ponzu, with a choice of salmon or tofu for the teriyaki bowls, and ahi tuna or prawns for the ponzu bowls and are priced at $16.99.

articles.title: Snack Wrap unwrapped: Here's why McDonald's is bringing back a fan favorite on July 10
articles.author: Dee-Ann Durbin
articles.summary: McDonald's will launch a new version of the Snack Wrap on July 10. The company is also continuing to update its app, with plans to offer a wider range of options through digital channels.

articles.title: VOOKI BioSense: Ushering in the future of laundry with science-backed, nature-powered fabric care
articles.author: SPOTLIGHT
articles.summary: VOOKI has introduced BIOSENSE, a new liquid laundry detergent designed to redefine fabric care by cleaning smarter and caring deeper. This bio-enzyme based detergent ensures whites stay white, colors stay bright, and fabrics remain soft with half the dose. VOOKI also plans to launch a suite of quick and innovative stain removers including stain remover pens, brass cleaner, burnt oil remover, and other products.

articles.title: Is this viral 2-in-1 mop really the 'perfect house cleaning tool?' It's on sale right now, so I tried it
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: JOYMOOP has launched a Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set. The JOYMOOP Mop and Bucket system features two chambers for washing and drying, a scraper blade to squeeze out liquid, and a 360-degree rotating mop head with an adjustable stainless steel handle. The mop comes with three machine-washable microfiber mop pads.

articles.title: Full list of 80 Asda stores that'll sell popular console on June 5
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5, with Asda offering the Mario Kart World Bundle for £429.98 on launch day. Amazon UK has restocked pre-orders of the base unit for £395.99. The Nintendo Switch 2 + Mario Kart World bundle costs £429.99 on the official Nintendo website.

articles.title: Prime Boost Gummies [Updated 2025]: Today Price For Sale?
articles.author: Malebiotix999
articles.summary: PrimeBoost Male Enhancement is a new male virility supplement designed to improve sexual performance, virility, and drive. It operates by enhancing blood flow to erectile tissue and supporting healthy testosterone levels. PrimeBoost is available for purchase on its official website.

articles.title: Green Gobbler's New Liquid Toilet Plunger Makes Clogs Disappear, No Mess Required
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Green Gobbler launched its new product, the Liquid Toilet Plunger, designed for easy and effective toilet clog removal without mess. The product is available for under $12 at major retailers like Amazon, Walmart, and Target and uses a bleach-free formula safe for toilets, pipes, and septic systems.

articles.title: Green Gobbler's New Liquid Toilet Plunger Makes Clogs Disappear, No Mess Required
articles.author: Green Gobbler
articles.summary: Green Gobbler launched the Liquid Toilet Plunger, a new mess-free solution designed to effectively unclog toilets. This product aims to provide an easier and less stressful alternative to traditional plungers.

articles.title: Wyr.ai Partners with Vuzix to Launch Its New M400 Smart Glasses-based AI-driven Quality Assurance Inspection Platform
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Vuzix and Wyr.ai have partnered to launch a new AI-driven quality assurance inspection platform that utilizes Vuzix M400 smart glasses. Wyr.ai's platform uses extended reality algorithms and artificial intelligence for visual quality assurance, automating quality control processes. This new platform targets U.S. Fortune 500 firms and offers features like automated carton count, defect detection, and real-time color matching.

articles.title: Yakuza Fans Should Call This Hotline Number
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Sega released a new Yakuza 0 Director's Cut trailer. Sega is launching Yakuza 0 on the Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 launching on July 1, company confirms
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Nothing is launching its Phone product in July. The company has confirmed the launch date.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Everything you need to know
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2, a new game console available on Thursday that can be used on the go or connected to a TV. The $700 device features a larger, sharper display with 1080p resolution and HDR, supports up to 4K resolution when connected to a TV, and integrates a GameChat feature along with GameShare capabilities.

articles.title: 3i's New Affordable Robot Vacuum Can Compact Dust Like a Roomba and Mop Your Floors
articles.author: Ajay Kumar
articles.summary: 3i is launching the G10 Plus robot vacuum, first showcased at CES 2025, featuring a mechanical paddle for dust compaction, UV light for sterilization and lidar navigation. This new product will cost $399 on Amazon starting June 16, and has an ultrasonic sensor to detect carpets while the robot is mopping.

articles.title: Barchart Launches Next Generation of cmdtyView for Excel, Unlocking Real-Time Market Data Across All Platforms
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Barchart has launched its next-generation cmdtyView for Excel, an upgraded Microsoft Excel add-in that streams live market data and global fundamental data directly into Excel across Windows, Mac, and the web. This new solution offers cross-platform access and faster performance for commodity traders, analysts, and risk managers.

articles.title: New pink-red flesh apple variety launched
articles.summary: Prevar has announced the release of its new pinky-red flesh apple cultivar, PremA021, which will be marketed under the brand name Fizz. Snazzy Fruit has been exclusively licensed for fresh fruit production and distribution of Fizz, with initial small volumes expected in select markets. The Fizz apple, developed through Plant & Food Research's apple breeding program, is known for its distinctive pink-red flesh and berry-like flavour.

articles.title: First Texas Google Store opens at Domain Northside
articles.author: Dacia Garcia
articles.summary: Google has opened its first store in Texas at Domain Northside. The Google Store features Google-made products.

articles.title: Wispr Flow releases iOS app in a bid to make dictation feel effortless
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.summary: Wispr Flow launched a new iOS app that functions as a keyboard, allowing users to type using their voice within any app. The app supports over 100 languages, learns custom terms, and claims to work in poor network conditions. Wispr Flow is free up to 2,000 words per week, with an unlimited plan available for a subscription fee.

articles.title: China's nontraditional retail hubs draw young shoppers
org: Beijing Capital Langyuan Culture Development Co., Ltd
Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development
articles.summary: Langyuan Station hosts Ziinlife, a designer home decor brand, allowing them to showcase their products in a unique spatial environment. Lao Ding Feng, a pastry brand, also uses Langyuan Station as a retail outlet, headquarters, and R&D center to present a reimagined brand identity.

articles.title: IOWN Technology: Revolutionizing Communication at Osaka Kansai Expo
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: NTT unveiled its IOWN technology at the Osaka Kansai Expo. IOWN technology, characterized by high speed, large capacity, and energy efficiency, was showcased through a virtual performance by Perfume and an AI-driven projection, demonstrating potential applications for immersive experiences and remote interaction.

articles.title: All-Time Record in 108-Year History: KSDL Achieves ₹186 Crore Turnover in May
articles.author: Bharath Anjanappa
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) achieved its highest monthly turnover of ₹186 crore in May. KSDL is also preparing to launch a new range of perfumes in the near future.

articles.title: Snowflake Intelligence and Data Science Agent Deliver The Next Frontier of Data Agents for Enterprise AI and ML
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Snowflake announced new agentic AI innovations at Snowflake Summit 2025. These innovations aim to bridge the gap between enterprise data and business action, facilitating AI and ML workflows for both technical and non-technical users.

articles.title: Intuit Supercharges GenOS for Delivery of Done-for-You Agentic AI Experiences to ~100 Million Consumers, Businesses
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Intuit has enhanced its GenOS platform with agentic AI capabilities, launching new development tools like GenStudio for LLM experimentation, Agent Starter Kit for AI agent building, and GenRuntime for intelligent data handling and AI integration. These tools are designed to streamline AI application development and enhance user experiences across desktop and mobile devices.

articles.title: From Launch to Sold Out: Cizelle Perfumes Capture Attention of Value-Conscious Consumers
articles.summary: Cizelle launched its collection of affordable luxury perfumes in India, inspired by popular designer scents. The brand experienced an overwhelming response, selling out its entire stock within hours of its online debut. Cizelle plans to restock and expand its product line, aiming to offer value-conscious consumers a new benchmark in accessible luxury.

articles.title: Snowflake Marketplace Adds Agentic Products and AI-Ready Data from Leading News, Research, and Market Data Providers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Snowflake announced the launch of new agentic products, Cortex Knowledge Extensions, on Snowflake Marketplace at Snowflake Summit 2025. Cortex Knowledge Extensions enables enterprises to enhance their AI applications with unstructured data from third-party providers, including The Associated Press, USA TODAY, CB Insights, Packt, and Stack Overflow.

articles.title: 34-year-old CEO shares his No. 1 piece of advice for entrepreneurs—it helped him build a $1 billion company
articles.author: Natalie Wu
articles.summary: Cirkul launched reusable water bottles with built-in disposable flavor cartridges. They faced manufacturing challenges because their product was novel, requiring them to manufacture it themselves. This approach differentiated them from other companies in the beverage space.

articles.title: Snowflake Unveils Next Wave of Compute Innovations For Faster, More Efficient Warehouses and AI-Driven Data Governance
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Snowflake introduced Standard Warehouse – Generation 2 (Gen2), an enhanced version of Snowflake's virtual Standard Warehouse, providing faster analytics performance compared to Managed Spark. Additionally, Snowflake unveiled Snowflake Adaptive Compute, a new compute service that maximizes efficiency through automatic resource sizing and sharing, enhancing performance without increasing costs.

articles.title: Wyze Launches Bulb Cam: Turn Any Light Fixture Into a Smart Security Camera and Smart Light
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Wyze launched the Wyze Bulb Cam on June 3, 2025. This new product is a motion-activated smart light and security camera designed for outdoor protection and automation.

articles.title: Derbion announces the official opening date and exciting launch plans for Seasalt
articles.author: Ellie Mitchell
articles.summary: Seasalt is opening a new 2,400 sq. ft store in Derbion on June 7th, offering a range of women's clothing, footwear, and accessories. The opening weekend includes a 20% discount, gifts for the first 50 shoppers, and free fudge samples. The store will feature Seasalt's signature hand-drawn prints and natural fabrics.

articles.title: PencilVac: Dyson unveils its thinnest and lightest vacuum yet
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the PencilVac, its lightest and thinnest vacuum cleaner to date. The PencilVac features a slim design, a new motor, Fluffycone brushes, and connectivity to the MyDyson app for advanced settings and maintenance. This new vacuum is designed for hard floors and offers a runtime of 30 minutes.

articles.title: How technology is revolutionizing Kenya's laundromat market
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: LG and Hotpoint are collaborating to support the growth of commercial laundry marts with hi-tech laundry machines. These machines feature technologies like smart features accessible via a mobile app, energy and water efficiency, high-temperature drying, and space-saving stackable designs. These technological advancements are transforming the laundromat business model and empowering communities through job creation and skills training.

articles.title: NioBay Makes Its First Product Deliveries to Potential Customers/Partners
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NioBay Metals Inc. has announced its first product deliveries originating from the SGS pilot plant located in Québec City. This marks a significant step in the company's product development and market introduction efforts.

articles.title: EY Studio+ Launches: AI-Powered Growth & Transformation
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: EY (Ernst & Young) launched EY Studio+, a new initiative focused on integrating AI-driven solutions with customer needs. EY Studio+ aims to assist companies in navigating the AI landscape, ensuring customer satisfaction and helping businesses achieve lasting growth by offering personalized AI solutions and data-driven insights.

articles.title: Standard Lithium, in Partnership with Telescope Innovations, to Produce Next Generation Solid-State Battery Materials
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Standard Lithium Ltd. successfully produced battery quality lithium sulfide. This achievement is part of a collaboration with Telescope Innovations, marking a significant step in near-commercial lithium production.

articles.title: Standard Lithium, in Partnership with Telescope Innovations, to Produce Next Generation Solid-State Battery Materials
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Standard Lithium, in partnership with Telescope Innovations, has successfully produced battery quality lithium sulfide. This lithium sulfide product, derived from Standard Lithium's Arkansas demonstration plant, is intended for use in solid-state batteries, utilizing a novel low-temperature, IP-protected method.

articles.title: Shack Hack: Any Size Soda for Just $1
articles.author: Michael Carpenter
articles.summary: Shake Shack introduced 'Shack Hacks,' starting May 28th, 2025, offering any size soda for $1 when ordered through the Shack App or shakeshack.com. Customers can purchase Coke, Coke Zero, Diet Coke, Sprite, or Fanta Orange for just a dollar.

articles.title: Classic and LE v5.4 is one Bluetooth module
articles.author: Eweekly
articles.summary: Wurth launched Skoll-I, a module certified for conformity in major target markets. Skoll-I facilitates connectivity between legacy and modern devices, presenting a new solution for device development.

articles.title: Sagtec Unveils AI-Powered Robotics Platform to Redefine Front-of-House Dining Operations
articles.author: Sagtec Global Limited
articles.summary: Sagtec Global Limited launched its AI-powered robotics platform designed for front-of-house operations in the global hospitality sector. The platform combines autonomous robotics, AI algorithms, and real-time software orchestration, targeting multinational restaurant groups and franchise chains. It aims to generate recurring revenue through hardware sales, AI software licensing, and customized branding packages.

articles.title: Treasure Data Launches AI Suites to Supercharge Customer Experiences and Transform Teams into "Superhumans"
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Treasure Data has launched new AI Suites for global enterprises, leveraging agentic AI to enhance revenue, reduce costs, and mitigate risk. Additionally, they introduced the Migration Agent, which accelerates CDP replacements by up to 60% by automating the migration process to Treasure Data's platform. Engage Studio, a new release by Treasure Data, is proof of the power of the intelligent CDP.

articles.title: H Company Launches Next-Generation Autonomous AI Agents for Enterprise and Consumer Markets
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: H Company has launched its next-generation European agent suite, including Runner H, Tester H, and Surfer H. They are also open-sourcing Holo-1 H, their cutting-edge visual-language model. These AI agents cover task execution, web navigation, and quality assurance, providing faster task completion and GDPR-first data handling.

articles.title: Next-Gen AI Agents from Exchange Solutions Set New Standard for Loyalty Intelligence
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Exchange Solutions has launched new AI agents to enhance its personalized loyalty solutions. These AI agents focus on personalization, analytics, audience discovery, and competitive intelligence, allowing marketers to operate more strategically with real-time insights and automated guidance. The expanded suite includes an Analytics Agent, Insights Agent, Offer Agent, Audience Agent, and Support Agent, with the Market Intelligence Agent and Voice-of-Member Agent to follow later in 2025.

articles.title: Samsung S22 Ultra vs. S22 Edge: 2-Week Review & Buying Advice
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is making waves with its ultra-thin Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge priced at $1,099. The phone features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset, 12GB of RAM, a 200MP wide-angle lens, and a 12MP ultra-wide lens, but has a smaller 3,900mAh battery compared to the S25 Plus which makes the users recharge frequently.

articles.title: Neo Farm Real Barrier 'Watery Hyaline' launch ｜ Sports Dong -A
articles.author: Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Neo Farm has launched the Watery Hyaline series, a new skincare line featuring cream, serum, and serum mask. The series utilizes a blend of 99% high-purity hyaluronic acid, nanoparticle hyaluronic acid and Eoseongcho PDRN to deliver potent hydration and skin-soothing benefits. The Watery Hyal Cream, a key product, incorporates Neo Farm's ceramide technology for lasting moisture and resilience.

articles.title: 32 Products So Useful You're Going To Want To Call Your Mom Just To Tell Her About Them
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Shark introduced the Steam & Scrub mop, which scrubs floors 150 times per minute with steam for easier cleaning. Febreze launched Unstopables car freshener to neutralize odors in cars. Revlon introduced Volcanic Face Roller with a volcanic stone to soak up excess oil on the face. TheraBreath launched Oral Rinse to fight bad breath for up to 24 hours.

articles.title: Get Body Wash at Myntra End of Reason Sale (31st May–12th June)
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is offering discounts on various body washes during its End of Reason Sale. Pears is promoting its Soft & Fresh Body Wash, Dove its Gentle Exfoliating Body Wash, Be Bodywise its 1% Salicylic Acid Body Wash, and LUX its Essence of Himalayas Brightening Body Wash.

articles.title: 2025 Tesla Cybertruck Photo Gallery (Future of Electric Trucks)
articles.author: Samantha Flores
articles.summary: Tesla launched the Cybertruck, a bold and unconventional electric pickup truck. The Cybertruck features an angular design, powerful tires, advanced safety systems, and camping gear options.

articles.title: data.world launches Data Marketplace: A revolutionary e-commerce experience transforms enterprise data discovery
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Data.world launched Data Marketplace in June 2025, an e-commerce-style discovery experience to help business users find and access data products within their organizations. This new marketplace provides a curated front door to data.world's catalog, displaying trusted data assets organized by domain and use case, simplifying data discovery with an intuitive interface.

articles.title: 47 Affordable Personal Care Products That Work
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Elizavecca offers a hair treatment packed with collagen and ceramide 3. Mucinex introduces a 2-in-1 saline nasal spray with two spritz settings. Rael Beauty offers Miracle Patches with hydrocolloid for absorbing fluids. Stila introduces One-Step Color-Correcting Facial Serum to brighten complexion. CeraVe offers salicylic acid body wash and a gentle eye cream.

articles.title: Vivera introduces quick-marinating frozen firm tofu
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: Vivera launched its new pre-frozen Firm Tofu on June 9th, targeting Asda and Ocado retailers. This new tofu product, priced at £2.75/2x200g, offers consumers a convenient, pan-ready, and flavor-absorbent plant-based protein option made from European organic soybeans.

articles.title: Renogy Strengthens Australian Market Reach with Retail Launch at Supercheap Auto
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Renogy has partnered with Supercheap Auto to offer its high-performance off-grid power products to Australian adventurers. The products will be available at selected Supercheap Auto retail locations nationwide.

articles.title: Bing lets you use OpenAI's Sora video generator for free
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched the Bing Video Creator, an AI video generator integrated into the Bing mobile app and built on OpenAI's Sora model. The new service allows users to generate short video clips from text prompts, offering both free and paid (via Microsoft Rewards) generation speeds. Initially available on Android and iPhone Bing Search apps, it aims to democratize AI video creation.

articles.title: Surrenders, indulgences, corruptions: We tasted what's new on the shelves
articles.summary: Yango Deli is introducing Doughlicious ice cream balls and cookie dough. Coca-Cola Israel is launching Nordic Mist flavored sodas and sparkling drinks. Dani and Galit are expanding their product line with Halva, Coconut, and Hazelnut Balls. Schestowitz's brand Today is adding Cream Rolls protein bars to its offerings.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 beginner's guide – should you buy it day one?
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2, a new console that is more powerful and slightly bigger than the original Switch. The Switch 2 features GameChat, which allows users to chat with friends online during gameplay, and a bigger, adjustable kickstand. Nintendo is selling a compatible USB-C camera accessory for £49.99 and offering free access to Nintendo Switch Online for GameChat until March 31, 2026.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 beginner's guide – should you buy it day one?
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2, a new hybrid console that can be played on the go or on TV.  It features GameChat for online gameplay communication and GameShare for sharing games with other Switch 2 owners. The console will cost £395.99, with a bundle including Mario Kart World available for £429.99.

articles.title: Meet Soot, an explosive new media experience that's killing the social feed
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Soot, a new visual catalog service, displays thousands of images simultaneously and sorts them by visual similarity or metadata. It offers monthly subscriptions for individuals and companies. Currently in private beta with 25,000 users and 4 million pieces of media, Soot aims to challenge conventional user experience paradigms.

articles.title: 44 Affordable Products With Great Results
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: L'Oréal Paris introduced Bright Reveal, a new dark spot correcting serum. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash, a body wash version of their facial Super Serum. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for a matte, radiant complexion.

articles.title: Dreame lands in Romania with its first flagship Showroom at eMAG Băneasa
articles.author: Aurel Dragan
articles.summary: Dreame Technology launched a retail space in Romania on May 31st, 2025, showcasing over 35 products including robot vacuum cleaners, air purifiers, and robotic lawnmowers. Customers can test flagship products like the Dreame X50 Ultra and benefit from online offers available on eMAG, with on-site support for order placement.

articles.title: Morrisons has launched a new 23-piece Big Daddy Breakfast
articles.author: Senior Journalist
articles.summary: Morrisons is launching the Big Daddy Breakfast, a 23-piece breakfast, in all Morrisons Cafés nationwide for Father's Day celebration. The breakfast will be available from June 2nd to June 15th and costs £10. Families can also enjoy the Kids Eat Free offer when purchasing the Big Daddy Breakfast.

articles.title: vivo Y29 combines rugged durability with smart features
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: vivo has launched the new Y29 smartphone, emphasizing its durability, AI-powered features like Circle to Search with Google and AI Erase, and a long-lasting 6500mAh battery with 44W FlashCharge. The vivo Y29 is available in vivo concept stores, authorized retailers, and official online platforms such as vivo e-store nationwide.

articles.title: Morrisons has launched a new 23-piece Big Daddy Breakfast and it's only £10
articles.author: Senior Journalist
articles.summary: Morrisons is re-launching the 'Big Daddy Breakfast' across its cafes for Father's Day. The 23-piece breakfast is available from June 2nd to June 15th for £10. Additionally, families can benefit from the Kids Eat Free offer with the purchase of the Big Daddy Breakfast or any meal over £5.

articles.title: Wonder, a 15-restaurant digital food hall, is opening its first Middlesex County location
articles.author: Jenna Intersimone
articles.summary: Wonder, a fast fine dining concept, is opening its first Middlesex County location in Woodbridge on June 5th. Customers can order from up to 15 Wonder spots, including Tejas Barbecue, Streetbird by Marcus Samuelsson, Di Fara Pizza, and Yasas by Michael Symon, with delivery available to multiple zip codes.

articles.title: FastBots Launches Groundbreaking Hybrid AI and Live Chat Feature to Transform Customer Support Operations
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: FastBots.ai launched its new Hybrid AI and Live Chat feature, which combines automated AI chat with human agent support to manage customer interactions. This feature is designed to help businesses scale customer support by utilizing AI for routine inquiries and allowing human agents to handle more complex interactions. The goal is to improve customer satisfaction, reduce response times, and enhance operational efficiency for companies across various sectors.

articles.title: Bing brings AI video tool to everyone for free, uses OpenAI Sora to generate AI clips
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced Bing Video Creator, a new AI tool for generating short videos from text prompts. Powered by OpenAI's Sora model, the tool is currently available on the Bing mobile app and allows users to create five-second video clips. Microsoft has also implemented AI safety measures to mitigate misuse, including blocking risky prompts and adding digital credentials to identify AI-generated content.

articles.title: NovaGPU to make AI accessible for Malaysian SMEs
articles.author: Business Times
articles.summary: IP ServerOne launched NovaGPU in April 2025, a GPU-as-a-Service platform, to make AI more accessible to SMEs. NovaGPU offers access to GPUs like NVIDIA RTX 3090, RTX 4090, and H200 NVL, billed hourly and accessible from the cloud, enabling SMEs to implement AI applications such as WhatsApp Chatbots and automated invoice reading.

articles.title: Sky confirms UK pricing for new Sky Glass Air smart TV
articles.summary: Sky launched the Sky Glass Air smart TV in the UK on June 10th. The TV runs on Sky OS and offers 4K picture quality and hands-free voice control. New customers can get a Sky Essential TV package from GBP 15 per month, which includes Sky TV, discovery+ and Netflix - giving them a Sky Glass Air TV package from GBP 21 per month.

articles.title: New Dell lineup will appeal to consumers looking for powerful, AI-enabled devices: Atul Mehta, Dell Technologies
articles.summary: Dell is launching a redesigned laptop lineup including Dell, Dell Pro, and Dell Pro Max replacing the Inspiron, XPS, and Latitude series, and has also launched Dell Plus, a new model powered by Intel Core Ultra processors with integrated Intel Arc Graphics, positioned for users demanding higher performance, enhanced security, and AI capabilities. Dell Plus offers up to 48 TOPS of performance and is optimized for over 300 AI features, meeting the needs of the evolving AI landscape.

articles.title: Koleksi Jam Mewah Mulai Jadi Tren Investasi, Ini Tips Memulainya
articles.summary: Stokshot introduces Inovasi ECI, featuring a new look and experience, aiming to become the top of mind product for customers.

articles.title: Zain exclusively offers Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge in Kuwait
articles.summary: Zain Kuwait exclusively offers the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge. The smartphone features the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Mobile Platform for Galaxy, a 3,900mAh battery with 25W wired and 15W wireless charging, and is available in Titanium Silver, Titanium Jet Black, and Titanium Icy Blue.

articles.title: This anti-hair wrap cordless vacuum just dropped to £99 from £299 - and buyers say it's 'better than Shark'
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: The Hoover Cordless Vacuum Cleaner With Anti Hair Wrap, Red - HF9 is on sale for £99 with the discount code EXCLUSIVE-HF9. The vacuum includes features like Turbo Boost, Anti-Twist technology, and has a battery life of 30 minutes. The deal expires on June 15, 2025.

articles.title: Gadgetlend.de: The online platform impresses with a huge selection of technology, trendy lifestyle products, high-quality kitchen gadgets and fine luxury foods.
articles.summary: Gadgetlend.de, a German e-commerce platform, is launching in the Ghanaian market, offering a diverse range of products including technology, lifestyle items, kitchen appliances, and luxury foods. The platform emphasizes sustainability by offering refurbished products alongside new items and aims to provide flexible and reliable delivery options to local customers.

articles.title: Sandtex Paints Strengthens Northern Nigeria Market Presence
articles.author: Leadership News
org: Portland Paints and Products Nigeria Plc
articles.summary: Sandtex Paints, a brand of Portland Paints and Products Nigeria Plc, has launched two new all-in-one experience centers in Kano, Northern Nigeria. These centers provide an interactive environment for customers to explore Sandtex Paints' premium coatings, finishes, and color systems. The initiative aims to cater to the growing demand for high-quality paints and enhance customer experience.

articles.title: Sky Q fans given new reason to switch with 70p-a-day TV offer – it includes over 100 channels and FREE Netflix
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Sky is launching Sky Glass Air, a thinner and more affordable version of its Sky Glass TV, on June 10 in three colors and sizes. The subscription for the TV starts at £6 per month with an interest-free loan, and the lowest package, including Sky Essential TV, Netflix, and Discovery+, costs £21 per month.

articles.title: GS25 announced on the 3rd that it will launch "Hyeja White Rice" in earnest and expand its own brand..
articles.author: Lee Hyo-Seok
articles.summary: GS25 is launching "Hyeja White Rice," a 210g instant rice priced at 1,000 won, making it the industry's lowest-priced option. This product is part of GS25's strategy to expand its own brand (PB) product lineup, focusing on ultra-low-priced items to meet increasing demand for affordable options.

articles.title: Washing machine with dryer for efficient laundry routine: Top 6 options for June 2025
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: LG, IFB, Electrolux, Bosch, and Voltas Beko introduced new washer-dryer models. The LG models feature AI Direct Drive technology, while IFB offers Aqua Energie and 4D Wash. Electrolux's UltimateCare 300 has Vapour Wash for allergen removal, and Bosch provides high-capacity options with near-complete drying. Voltas Beko offers a budget-friendly solution with Monsoon Dry.

articles.title: Flyby and noon Partner to Bring AdTech Innovation to Last-Mile Delivery
articles.summary: noon, in partnership with Flyby, has launched a new mobile digital Out-of-Home (DOOH) advertising medium utilizing noon's delivery fleet. Flyby's Smart Delivery Boxes will be deployed across noon's fleet, turning the delivery bikes into a data-driven advertising platform. This partnership expands noon ads' offering to give advertisers a new way to reach audiences in high-impact urban environments with hyper-targeted reach.

articles.title: 25 Target Beauty Steals That Beat Expensive Brands
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: MCoBeauty launched the Summer Daze Tinted Lip Oil, while Essence introduced a mini eyeshadow palette. ColourPop offers single eyeshadows and a highlighter stick. Other new or highlighted products include Native hair mask, Black Girl Sunscreen SPF 30, Essie nail polish and cuticle oil, Thayers facial toner, E.l.f. face sponge and eyeliner, Neutrogena makeup-removing wipes, Ogx anti-breakage serum, Maybelline mascara, Jergens moisturizer, Revlon kiss balm, Versed bronzer stick, Kristen Ess shampoo, Aquaphor healing ointment, Garnier micellar water and hairspray, Odele detangling tonic, The Doux Mousse, and Wet n Wild lipstick.

articles.title: Infinix GT 30 Pro to launch in India today at 12 PM: All you can expect
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Infinix is launching its GT Pro product in India today.

articles.title: AI gets personal, but can it get it right?
articles.summary: Tapestry leveraged generative AI to create digital twins of its products, resulting in improved internal collaboration and products that better matched customer expectations. IPG Health's Studio Rx developed 'Rxies,' illustrated characters co-created with generative AI, enabling rapid content output. These examples showcase the use of generative AI to enhance product development and marketing efforts.

articles.title: Just 29 Things From Amazon You Need To Be Introduced To
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Laneige is introducing Neo Blurring Powder, a semi-matte powder that absorbs shine for oily skin. Maybelline launches a volumizing brow mousse for filling, fluffing, and taming brows.  The LoudCup is introduced, a double-walled insulated cup with a built-in horn for sporting events.

articles.title: Android XR: Everything you need to know
articles.author: Florence Ion
articles.summary: Google's Android XR platform is set to power a new wave of mixed reality devices. Samsung is expected to launch its Project Moohan headset, while Xreal is developing Project Aura smart glasses, both anticipated for release in 2025. These devices will integrate Google's AI, Gemini, and aim to compete with existing products like Apple Vision Pro and Meta's offerings.

articles.title: Viral TikTok Products You Missed But Need Now
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Nyx launched Fat Oil Lip Drip as a Dior alternative. Medicube introduced a Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask. Dae launched Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream, Aelfric Eden launched a weenie dog hoodie, Oxo released its new compact Brew Rapid Brewer, Juno & Co. introduced a cleansing balm, and Stanley launched a teensy tiny 14-ounce Stanley Cup.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 10 goes on sale today for pre-booked users: Price, specs, and launch offers
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: iQOO launched the iQOO Neo 10 smartphone on June 2. The smartphone features a 7,000mAh battery, 120W fast charging, and a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset, with prices starting at ₹31,999. Early buyers will receive complimentary iQOO TWS 1e earphones.

articles.title: Mystore Unveils Mystore Genie, an AI Agent Built On Google Cloud to Supercharge ONDC Network Buyer Journeys
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Mystore has launched Mystore Genie, an advanced AI Agent designed to transform how buyers discover and shop for products on the ONDC network. Mystore Genie empowers buyers with conversational voice and text search and simplifies product discovery. Mystore Genie can be tailored into sector-specific AI Agent for domains such as agriculture, banking, FMCG, automotive, and service-based industries.

articles.title: Will Shane Bieber RECLAIM His Ace Status in Cleveland?
articles.summary: WeAreIowa introduces its WeAreIowa app for streaming on mobile phones. The app enables users to stream WeAreIowa content directly on their phones.

articles.title: Tineco Updates S9 Line-up with S9 Artist Steam Floor Washers  for an Even Better Cleaning Experience
articles.author: Media Out Reach Newswire
articles.summary: Tineco launched the S9 Artist Steam on June 6th, a new smart cleaning device featuring HyperSteam Technology and Flash Charging. The new model offers upgrades, including extended runtime up to 75 minutes and more efficient cleaning. Tineco is also rolling out exclusive launch promotions across official retail channels.

articles.title: BENEO (June 12/25) Faba Beans: Solutions in Baked Goods and Dairy-Free Applications, Upcoming Webinar Hosted by Xtalks
articles.author: Xtalks
articles.summary: A webinar focuses on faba bean protein's functional and nutritional properties for use in dairy alternatives and baked goods with reduced or no egg content. Expert speakers showcase recipes and applications of faba bean protein, a clean-label, allergen-free, and nutritious ingredient, in replacing eggs in bakery applications to manage price volatility and meet vegan goals.

articles.title: AI Boom Exposes Power Crisis in Data Centers: ScaleFlux Offers a Smarter Way to Scale
articles.author: Scale Flux
articles.summary: Post has introduced the FX5016, a next-generation controller designed to make SSDs faster and more efficient for AI and data-heavy workloads. This controller powers the CSD5000 series of high-performance NVMe drives, which aim to increase storage capacity, drive lifespan, and reduce power usage without requiring custom software.

articles.title: Google Ads Partner NZ: Why Ultimate Web Designs Is The Top Choice For Kiwi Businesses
articles.author: Kiwi Economics
articles.summary: Ultimate Web Designs offers Google Ads management services across New Zealand. Their services include keyword research, ad copywriting & A/B testing, conversion tracking & landing page optimisation, budget management & ROI analysis and weekly/monthly reporting & campaign adjustments. They offer packages for small to large businesses across NZ.

articles.title: I Installed This Alternate Launcher to Get Rid of the Ads on Google TV
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Projectivy Launcher is a new alternative launcher for Google TV and Android TV, available for free with limited features or for a one-time fee of $7.50 to unlock full customization options. It offers a revamped look and feel, replacing the default interface with a customizable skin.

articles.title: China leading in capacity and innovation
articles.author: 闫星周
articles.summary: Astellas has launched the world's first CLDN18.2-targeted therapy in China and the "Astellas Pharma JD Flagship Store" in collaboration with JD Health. Syensqo is investing in an AI laboratory in their Shanghai research and innovation center. Evonik is utilizing digital tools like the energy management system DEnMS to monitor energy metrics across its Chinese production sites.

articles.title: The Ninja Blast Max is a Convenient, Portable Blending Hurricane
articles.author: Rob Edwards
articles.summary: SharkNinja has launched the Ninja Blast Max, a portable blender featuring PowerBlast Technology. This blender has a 650mL capacity, AUTO IQ programs, and a Twist & Go vessel for portability. It comes with a rechargeable motor base, sip lid, charging cable, and recipe guide.

articles.title: Flyby and noon Partner to Bring AdTech Innovation to Last-Mile Delivery
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Noon, a digital ecosystem, has partnered with Flyby to introduce a new product or service.

articles.title: Environment Authority launches 'Naqi' air quality index app
articles.author: Times
articles.summary: The Environment Authority launched the "Naqi" app, a new digital platform for smartphones. The app provides users with real-time environmental data.

articles.title: The Sky Glass Air TV Is Finally Here – And It Rewrites The TV Price Rulebook
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Sky has introduced a new entry-level TV, with subscriptions starting at £6 a month. This represents a new product offering from Sky aimed at budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Microsoft will finally stop bugging Windows users about Edge — but only in Europe
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Microsoft is introducing new features for Windows users in the European Economic Area, allowing them to uninstall Edge and remove Bing results from Windows search. Apps installed and distributed from the Microsoft Store will continue to receive updates.

articles.title: Tineco Updates S9 Line-up with S9 Artist Steam Floor Washers  for an Even Better Cleaning Experience
articles.author: Vietnam News
articles.summary: Tineco has launched the S9 Artist Steam floor washer, the newest addition to its S9 lineup. This innovative floor washer combines cutting-edge technology, energy efficiency, and a sleek design to provide an enhanced cleaning experience.

articles.title: Best Beauty Picks
articles.summary: Amazon Australia is offering GHD hair straighteners for under $200. The product is described as 'the best straightener on the market for all hair types.'

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3) Release Date: iPhone Challenger Confirms New Flagship Coming Soon
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Tech innovator Nothing is launching its new smartphone, Nothing Phone (3), on July 1st at 18:00 BST. The new phone may feature a more advanced lighting array instead of the Glyph system. A live event to reveal the Phone (3) seems likely as Nothing has held such events before.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Reviews Won't Drop Before Launch — Here's Why
articles.author: Kris Holt
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2 console on June 5th. The company did not provide Switch 2 units to reviewers ahead of launch because "important features and updates" will be unlocked via a system update available on launch day.

articles.title: Ellis Brooklyn Celebrates 10 Years With Their First Rollerball Perfumes, Plus How They Changed Fragrance
articles.author: Celia Shatzman
articles.summary: Ellis Brooklyn is releasing fragrance oil rollerballs to celebrate its 10th anniversary, reminiscent of their earlier, unisex scents, and including scents like Milk Wood, Blonde Musk, and Vanilla Santo. They also successfully launched Banana Milkshake Hair and Body Fragrance Mist, exceeding sales expectations. The brand aims to continue launching innovative products and grow its brand.

articles.title: Microsoft To Finally Stop Bugging Windows Users About Edge - But Only in Europe
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Microsoft announced new features for Windows, Edge, and Bing. These changes include allowing Windows machines to uninstall Edge and remove Bing results from Windows search. The updates are a response to the Digital Markets Act.

articles.title: Nintendo sends Switch 2 ‘out of stock' signs to shops in preparation for launch
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Nintendo is signaling future announcements or releases, indicating forthcoming news about the company's products or services.

articles.title: I've played new Nintendo Switch 2 for HOURS – I'm obsessed with latest Mario Kart ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Nintendo will launch the new Nintendo Switch 2 console on June 5th. The Sun's tech editor Sean Keach previewed the new console.

articles.title: NTS Acquires Trailblazer Innovations, Accelerating Growth in Defense and Homeland Security Sectors
articles.author: THe Post
articles.summary: NexTech Solutions (NTS), a leading provider, is mentioned, hinting at potential news regarding their products or services.

articles.title: Sony try to disrupt Nintendo Switch 2 launch with surprise PS5 State of Play
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Sony has announced a new PS5 presentation.

articles.title: 2025 Bentley Bentayga Speed Breaks Cover, W12 Makes Way For V8 Engine
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Bentley has unveiled the 2025 Bentley Bentayga Speed. The new model includes an updated power unit.

articles.title: 3i's New Affordable Robot Vacuum Can Compact Dust Like a Roomba and Mop Your Floors
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: 3i introduces the G10 Plus, an affordable robot vacuum. This vacuum features dust compaction, allowing users to go up to 60 days without emptying the dustbin.

articles.title: Stanley just dropped 2 new limited-edition camping tumblers — here's where to get them
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Stanley introduced a new limited-edition Tumbler designed for camping trips, campfires, and RV roadtrips.

articles.title: Tineco Updates S9 Line-Up With S9 Artist Steam Floor Washers For An Even Better Cleaning Experience
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Tineco launched the S9 Artist Steam, a new innovative floor washer and the latest addition to their best-selling S9 lineup. This product aims to provide the ultimate clean.

articles.title: Bubbies Ice Cream Expands Beyond Mochi with the Launch of New Mini Ice Cream Cookie Sandwiches
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bubbies Ice Cream is expanding its frozen novelty portfolio. Bubbies Ice Cream is debuting new Mini Mochi Bites. The new product is Mini Mochi Bites.
